Class NotificationUtils

extends java.lang.Object
    Represents utility methods that simplifies working with notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • createAwaitor

        public static SynchronizationEvent.Awaitor<Notification> createAwaitor(ManagementConnector connector,
                                                       java.lang.String listId,
                                                       NotificationListener listener)
        Adds a new notification listener and returns synchronous awaitor for it.

        You can use this method for synchronization with notification delivery. When notification accepted then infrastructure removes the subscribed synchronization listener from it.

        Parameters:
        connector - The notification listener connector. Cannot be null.
        listId - An identifier of the subscription list.
        listener - The notification filter. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        Notification awaitor that can be used to obtain notification synchronously; or null if notifications for the specified event category is not supported by connector.

      • createAwaitor

        public static SynchronizationEvent.Awaitor<Notification> createAwaitor(ManagementConnector connector,
                                                       java.lang.String listId)
        Adds a new notification listener and returns synchronous awaitor for it.

        You can use this method for synchronization with notification delivery. When notification accepted then infrastructure removes the subscribed synchronization listener from it.

        Parameters:
        connector - The notification listener connector. Cannot be null.
        listId - An identifier of the subscription list.
        Returns:
        Notification awaitor that can be used to obtain notification synchronously; or null if notifications for the specified event category is not supported by connector.
